Electrical, Alternator 08

ALTERNATOR, Diagnostics

Includes:
1. Perform Battery Diagnostic
2. Perform battery load test
3. Perform voltage drop test
4. Perform alternator circuit test
5. Check alternator output

Notes:
1. Not to be used in conjunction with battery or starter diagnostics

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A08-3105 All Models 0.5

ALTERNATOR, R & R or Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R alternator pulley and fan

Excludes:
1. ALTERNATOR, DIAGNOSTIC

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A08-100 All Others 0.6
R08-100 9000 COE 0.8

ALTERNATOR (REMOVED), Repair

Includes:
1. Disassemble, clean, inspect, replace failed components and reassembly

Excludes:
1. ALTERNATOR, R & R OR REPLACE

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Alternators A08-120 All Models 1.6

ALTERNATOR PULLEY AND/OR FAN (IN CHASSIS), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A08-110 All Models 0.3

BELT (ALTERNATOR), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Notes:
1. Refer to group 12 accessory drive belt for International engines

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Engines Except International Engines A08-130 All Models 0.5

Addon If Required   Code Applies To Hours
BELT (ALTERNATOR), Replace        
Accessory belts Each A08-130-1 All Models 0.2

WARRANTY OPERATIONS NOT COVERED IN THIS SECTION, T-Time

Notes:
1. This is not to be used to code diagnosis, testing or cleaning of operations already covered in this section. The time for those items is included in the operation. A written description or explanation must accompany each

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
T-TIME A08-T1 All Models 0.0
T-TIME A08-T2 All Models 0.0
T-TIME A08-T3 All Models 0.0
